ol.li: EHS Principles are the basis for the Life Saving Protocols that have been developed to ensure personnel execute basic actions that prevent incidents, injuries and losses caused by common glass industry activities.
EHS Principles are also the basis for the “Golden Rules” that complement the Life Saving Control Protocols listed within.
